tool_description: This tool retrieves protein sequences from the UniProt database. Given a UniProt accession number or identifier, it queries the database to fetch the full amino acid sequence of the specified protein. This tool is useful for researchers who need to access the primary sequence information for further analysis, including functional annotation, alignment, and structural prediction.

required_parameters.name: uniprot_id
required_parameters.description: The Uniprot ID of the target protein sequence

return_values.name: protein_sequence
return_values.description: The protein sequence of the target protein.
